Title: Taxi Driver Safeguard Training
Description:
Southampton City Council wish to appoint a contractor to undertake safeguarding training for taxi drivers, as detailed within the Invitation to quote document.

For full details please register on the SCC online sourcing portal which can be accessed here https://supplysouthampton.esourcingportal.com/ the procurement will be listed under Current Opportunities.  It is titled "Taxi Driver Safeguard Training" and has a reference number "SCC-SG-960" 

For Technical assistance please either consult the Curtis Fitch Support Site (http://www.curtisfitch.com/support/suppliers) which contains user guides and tips for submitting your quotation, or the Curtis Fitch helpdesk can be contacted on 01242 530 900

Title: NOTHAMPTON BOROUGH COUNCIL- REQUEST FOR QUOTATION FOR TAXI & PRIVATE HIRE DRIVERS NEW & RENEWAL IDENTIFICATION VERIFICATION & DISCLOSURE & BARRING APPLICATIONS
Description: Northampton Borough Council (The Authority) invites quotations for the provision of Taxi and Private Hire Drivers New & Renewal Identification Verification & Disclosure and Barring Applications (DBS). If interested, please express your interest in this opportunity through the link below and submit RFQ completed form via the ProContract system by 3rd of August 2018 at 12pm

Organisation Name: CHESTERFIELD ROYAL HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST
Title: Provision of Electronic Knowledge Tests for Taxi and Private Hire Drivers
Description: Chesterfield Borough Council invites quotations for the supply and maintenance of computer software that examines the knowledge of an applicant for a taxi or private hire driver's licence with regard to relevant law and policy, geography, routes, points of interest, maths and English and safeguarding.  This contract will run for 3 years with an option to extend for a further year upon satisfactory performance and business needs.
